named-query.name: JpaEntry.getFullById
named-query.query: from JpaEntry entry join fetch entry.addressees join fetch entry.addressees addr join fetch addr.recipients recip where entry.id = :entryId

named-query.name: JpaEvent.getAllByEntryId
named-query.query: from JpaEvent event where event.entry.id = :entryId order by event.timestamp

named-query.name: JpaEvent.getByEntryIdAndEventId
named-query.query: from JpaEvent event where event.entry.id = :entryId and event.id = :eventId order by event.timestamp
